title: Big Mouth Toys BMBG-0008 Big Mouth Beer Glass Elfed Up, Plastic
features: Holiday Beer Glass: This holiday beer glass features the text “let’s get elfed up!” and has a pair of elf ears on the rim! This beer glass is perfect for the beer lover in you!
16 Oz beer Glass: This beer glass easily holds 16 oz. of your favorite beer.
High Quality Glass: The beer glass is made of real glass and is a great collectible for any beer lover. It makes a great addition to any bar or home décor.
Novelty Gift: The beer glass is perfect for the beer snob in your life (even if it’s yourself). It makes for a hilarious gift for any beer lover or for the holidays!
Easy Care: This glass is easy to care for, it can be easily hand washed for repeated uses
description: Put on some wrap music and party like it’s the twelf day of Christmas The holidays mean it’s time to break out the good beer and deck the halls with boughs of jolly. Our new Elfed Up beer glass will get you “in the spirits”—it holds 16 oz of your favorite brewski to get you fired up for the gift swap. It’s made of high quality glass so you can make it a part of your holiday tradition, year after year. it’s a beer glass with ears that get to the point—Happy Holidays! holds 16 oz. of delicious beer great for gift swaps (and yourself who are we kidding)
